      static String DEFAULT_TAX_RATES
      Flag to indicate whether or not to use default tax rates; a call to IInventoryService.getItem(String, com.clover.sdk.v1.ResultStatus) will always return the appropriate tax rates needed to calculate total item cost to the customer.

      • DEFAULT_TAX_RATES

        static final String DEFAULT_TAX_RATES
        Flag to indicate whether or not to use default tax rates; a call to IInventoryService.getItem(String, com.clover.sdk.v1.ResultStatus) will always return the appropriate tax rates needed to calculate total item cost to the customer.

        Type: INTEGER
